snippet: The British business secretary, Vince Cable, had called for the breakup of the Royal Bank of Scotland -- the latest in a series of statements that have raised questions over the government's role in the running of the British bank.
abstract: The British business secretary, Vince Cable, had called for the breakup of the Royal Bank of Scotland -- the latest in a series of statements that have raised questions over the government's role in the running of the British bank.

headline.main: Britain Rejects Plan to Split Up R.B.S.
